entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rarely build BuildAfterTargetingPack.csproj #60530
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudListProducts #60528
  • Perf regression: json #60527
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #60526
  • Add Razor Component templating for Minimal Api #60522
  • Description parameter of ProducesResponseTypeAttribute does not work in minimal API app #60518
    Backlog
  • Build Failure with Error: "FilterStaticWebAssetEndpoints" task failed unexpectedly. #60517
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Setting a dynamic duration with ResponseCacheAttribute #60516
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: updates #60514
  • OpenApi convert to snackcase #60513

Closed

  • Support XML-based OpenAPI docs for minimal and controller-based APIs with `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` #39927
    10.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: tls-renegotiation-kestrel #60347
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-validation, mTls-handshakes-kestrel, mTls-handshakes-kestrel #60346
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, tls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-handshakes-kestrel #60345
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-validation, antiforgery-validation, tls-renegotiation-kestrel #60344
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, antiforgery-validation, tls-handshakes-kestrel #60343
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mTls-handshakes-httpsys, tls-handshakes-httpsys #60342
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes, fortunes #60341
  • Stale code? #60209
  • XML document application should handle void-returning methods #60417
    10.0-preview2
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorWebInteractiveAuto, blazorWebInteractiveServer, blazorWebInteractiveWebAssembly #60441
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #60440
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60439
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #60435
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60434
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #60433
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #60432
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #60431
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60430
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #60429
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60428
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #60427
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #60426
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #60425
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #60424
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #60420
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.BadHttpRequestException: Unexpected end of request content. #23949
    Backlog
  • Minimal API : Converting empty string to Nullable (ex: int?) with [FromForm] binding #55202
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #60502
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #60515
  • openapi with newtonsoft.json suppport generate incorrect request/response model schema #60458
  • Perf improvement: json, updates #60500
  • "network error" - unhandled exception - Blazor WASM - Streaming http requests from IAsyncEnumerable api endpoint #55982
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Issue #60416 - Correction of BufferedReadStream 's Position #60529
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/10.0-preview2] [release/10.0-preview1] Do not remove wixpacks from items to sign #60525
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] [release/10.0-preview1] Do not remove wixpacks from items to sign #60524
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Avoid logging bad requests as application errors if the connection was aborted #60359
    area-networking, 10.0-preview3
  • Limit types that get converted to null for empty/null input in NullableConverter #60498
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • [release/10.0-preview2] Revert "Revert "Revert "Update .NET build URLs""" #60520
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview2
  • Revert "Revert "Revert "Update .NET build URLs""" #60519
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • [release/10.0-preview1] Do not remove wixpacks from items to sign #60523
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to preview3 #60508
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Update milestones for Preview2/3 #60521
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Avoid IISHttpServer close race on construction #60399
    area-networking, 10.0-preview2
  • [main] Fix ItemsToSign #60507
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview2

Updated

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `445e9bd` to `c00fd25` #60393
    area-infrastructure
  • update area owners #60421
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Enhance Lockout Functionality: Add Test for AccessFailedAsync Incrementing Count #60350
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-networking
  • [Templates][Identity] Update jquery-validation to 1.20.0 #60148
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Revert "Revert "[release/8.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60352
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Revert "Revert "[release/9.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60353
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • script-migration of an example in the doc doesn't work (adding raw SQL) #35662
  • AsNoTracking() loses performance if used with .Take() method? #35661
  • AOT Setup in .NET 8 On Lambda Fails #35659
  • Context contains deleted entries after saving when Entity has HashSet #35658
  • Property using Enum with ExecuteUpdateAsync throws 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' #35656
    9.0.x

Closed

  • KeyNotFoundException when dropping and creating table in EF Core 9.0 migration #35660
  • dotnet ef migrations has-pending-model-changes should honour the --project argument #35637

PullRequests

Merged

  • Process Coalesce-simplified Convert node properly in funcletizer #35657

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More information when provisioning goes wrong #27940
  • iOS: Rectangle that is invisible when page loads can never be made visible #27935
    Backlog
  • Selective Exception breakpoints do not work properly #27934
  • [SFI] Fix nuget.config #27927
    .NET 9 SR5
  • AccessViolationException in CarouselView on dynamic Shell navigation on Windows #27925
  • I9_Scroll by object for grouped data - The group name is always pined at the top after clicking 'Scroll to Proboscis Monkey' button #27922
    Backlog
  • OOP Background task not firing in MAUI app for Windows on .NET 8 and .NET 9 #27919

Closed

  • Preferences problems with DateTime #27903
  • [MAUI] .NET 9 GA BlazorWebView not rendering on ARM64 Windows Desktop #26003
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Enable Blazor device tests #27556
    .NET 10 Planning
  • ScrollView doesn't center its content. #11315
  • Can't Create Default Android Device #27910
  • Flyout RightToLeft is not working on Android #17057
    Backlog
  • How to switch .NET MAUI Flyout of Shell to the right with FlowDirection? #15221
    Backlog
  • Maui -9.0.40 error : Failed to AOT compile SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 139. #27867
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Flyout automatically closes when FlyoutPage.Detail is updated #26324
    .NET 10 Planning
  • FATAL EXCEPTION when navigating back MAUI 9.0.40 #27901
  • [net10.0] Enable warnings for CS9270 #27315
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Vscode MacOs publish IOS error Invalid Binary #27914
  • Using GridLength.Star in RowDefinition leads to wrong row height #26779
  • System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path migrating Xamarin App to MAUI #27626
  • Slider appears to loose two way binding once manually adjusted with the thumb #27442
  • CollectionView VerticalScrollBarVisibility的Always不起作用 #27755
  • [Bug] iOS: On-Demand Resource Tag not available to be set #27213
  • Unable to use custom appicon always defaults to android appicon #27625
  • Using Maui.Controls.Maps crashes application #27219
  • Newly created maui app has errors #27756

PullRequests

Created

  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation
  • Bump appium #27939
  • [android] move `IsDispatchRequiredImplementation()` to Java #27936
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] Navigation from the 'More' tab - improvements #27932
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Testcase for Shell FlowDirection issue #27931
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Testing] Empowering UITests with AI #27929
    do-not-merge, area-testing
  • [Testing] Publish new snapshots and diffs to a specific artifacts folder #27928
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview1] Update sdk and aspnet versions #27926
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview1
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27924
    area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker

Merged

  • Update Appium Versions #27933
    area-testing
  • Revert "Update Appium Versions" #27938
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27918
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md with net10.0 #27913

Updated

  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failing tests in upgrade to VS 17.14p1 #77293

Closed

  • IDE0065 (Using directives must be placed outside of a namespace declaration) is noisy for alias declarations inside namespace #43271
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio operates on outdated cache after git pull again #73455
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35819.86 #77286
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.idex.dev18roaming-35819.94 #77285

PullRequests

Created

  • Make razor generator always run: #77304
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77303
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable realtime monitoring in the official pipeline #77302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.14] Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate Method [draft] #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix false positive 'Unnecessary assignment of a value' #77297
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add test demonstrating issue. #77290
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Flesh out handling of symbols synthesized during lowering of extension methods #77287
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Update to release nuget packages (#77261) #77298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [release/dev17.13] Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't use hardcoded line endings #77296
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow Semantic Search query function to take symbol parameter #77272
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove out of support branches from PublishData.json #77294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update PublicAPI files for 17.13 ship (#77266) #77295
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next
  • Collection expression arguments: support [CollectionBuilder] factory methods #76998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Update debugger contracts to fix hot reload issue #77284
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update to release nuget packages #77261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch TextDocumentState.GetTextVersionAsync to ValueTask to reduce allocations. #77213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add an option to ignore aliases when moving using directives outside a namespace #77291
    VSCode, Next
  • Fill some gaps in the LSP #77289
    VSCode, Next
  • Update runtime async spec #76872
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async, Next
  • Mix the source generator version info into the dependent checksum we get for projects #77273
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Ensure diagnostics refresh when source generators run in balanced mode #77271
    untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation Auto-Insert #76665
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #76832
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extensions: include receiver parameter in display string #77283
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Allow expression body refactorings on non empty selections #76969
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: more tests #77280
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Make diagnostic checksum computation into an extension method. #77277
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Razor EA #77194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • WIP: Initial work to support bulk renaming of files to match types contained within. #77239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net9 - Inconsistent result for GZipStream compression between Windows and Linux (Ubuntu/WSL) #112770
  • Json.DeepEquals incorrectly returns true for when comparing objects with only null values #112769
  • Why my ETW provider is now showing up in logman? #112768
  • JIT fails to treat expression as non-negative after range check #112765
    10.0.0
  • Track APX push2/pop2 OS changes for .NET unwinder changes #112762
  • ConcurrentBag Memory Leak #112759
  • [APX] Get ThreadContext for APX extended registers #112757
    10.0.0
  • Zero-sized diffs in smoke_tests.nativeaot #112756
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.ConvertTests.ConvertChecked test failure #112755
  • Timeout in SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandlerTest.GetAsync_ManyDifferentResponseHeaders_ParsedCorrectly #112752
  • CoreCLR Interpreter #112748
    10.0.0
  • .NET 9 Applications can randomly freeze when being debugged #112747
    10.0.0
  • CoreCLR Interpreter - diagnostics #112744
    10.0.0
  • CoreCLR Interpreter - preventing executable code generation at runtime #112743
    10.0.0
  • CoreCLR Interpreter - CoreCLR support #112742
    10.0.0
  • Can not build dotnet runtime due to 404 error while installing dotnet sdk v10.0.100-alpha.1.25077.2 #112739
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CollectionTests "Assert.Equal() Failure: Values differ" #112738
  • [System.Text.Json] Stack Overflow when appending modifiers to TypeInfoResolverChain #112735
    10.0.0
  • [mono] bug about wasm single thread using lock #112734
    10.0.0
  • NU1511 warnings/errors for test projects with .NET 10 SDK #112729
  • Dotnet on OSX is limited to 10240 file handles #112726
  • JIT: Redundant bounds check, computed lower bound is `Dependent` instead of 0 #112725
    Future

Closed

  • Dotnet build hangs at CoreCompile when specific NuGet package referenced #112502
    10.0.0
  • ARM64 architecture in Debian 9 repository #3298
    Future
  • AV in System.Threading.Tests failing with JitStress #112683
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TimeOfDay set and AtTimeOfDay function #112731
  • Problem: nothing provides libopenssl1_1 needed by dotnet-runtime-deps-2.2-2.2.7-1.x86_64 #3768
    Future
  • HostingAbstractionsHostExtensions RunAsync disposes without logging #72225
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add ObjectDisposedException static throw based on boolean #112746
  • [API Proposal]: M.E.C.M. MemoryCache - add ReadOnlySpan<char> get API #110504
    10.0.0
  • Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension returns full path and filename #112707
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_82535/Runtime_82535/Runtime_82535.dll #112333
    10.0.0
  • [browser] itanium_demangle symbols in .wasm file #110861
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Unchecked write barriers are emitted for stack allocated arrays #112709
    10.0.0
  • Calling GCHandle.Free causes other handles to be released #112727
  • Inject HttpClient get Error: Method not found: SocketsHttpHandler.get_MeterFactory() #112634
  • [API Proposal]: X509Certificate.ExportPkcs12 with PBE parameters #80314
    Future
  • Performance regression: PerfLabTests.StackWalk.Walk #13136
  • Pinned object problems #37205

PullRequests

Created

  • Use rangecheck in assertprop #112766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Record and replay `notifyInstructionSetUsage` properly #112764
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Document important nuances about Dictionary/HashSet #112760
    area-System.Collections
  • Clarify comments for `ClrRestoreNonvolatileContextWorker`. #112758
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/10.0-preview2] Bump downlevel for 10.0p2 #112754
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112753
    area-System.Diagnostics, 10.0.0
  • Add benchmarks.run_pgo_optrepeat collection #112750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change the Unix cert store to store certificates with AES256+SHA256 PBES2 #112749
    area-System.Security
  • Use pooled Utf8JsonWriter when doing sync streaming serialization. #112745
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Support bitwise field extractions from parameter registers #112740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow condition when appending modifiers to resolver chains. #112737
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Make linux-riscv nativeaot port robust #112736
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Keep small-typedness information for return temps introduced by GDV #112733

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Swift language features] Add special handling of `Swift.Array` and `Swift.Set` bound generics #2982
  • [Projection tooling] Investigate demangler errors for async functions #3007

Updated

  • [Swift shipping] Create `Swift.Bindings` and tooling NuGet packages in the dotnet-experimental feed #2849
  • [Swift shipping] Implement device testing framework #2850
  • [Swift language feature] Support async generics methods & special-case Array/Set bound generics methods #3001

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Swift Bindings] Initialize bound generics handling #3003
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift shipping] Setup MacCatalyst tests on the CI #2998
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Functional tests for `InitWithCopy` and `Destroy` functions in value witness table #3009
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add WasmExternalDwarf property to create an external_debug_info section #2786
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Document memory ownership and handling at the Swift–C# boundary #3008
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "dotnet restore" and "dotnet publish" use relative BaseIntermediateOutputPath even if it's set to absolute path #46990
  • "@" in path broke "copy always" option for files in .net9 sdk #46987
  • BadImageFormatException referencing an x64 assembly in a "single file" / "self contained" application #46984

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor clean-up in src/Layout/redist #46994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR step to validate asset baseline #46991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #46989
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, Branch Lockdown
  • Allow to fingerprint Blazor.js #46988
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #46977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove dead code from redist-installer #46978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use package download in generate layout #46925
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Fix GenerateLayout target dependencies when skipping crossgen #46982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Fix typo for forwarding the DAC signing arguments #46981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix GenerateLayout target dependencies when skipping crossgen #46979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Fix definition of PgoTerm and properties based on Versions #46980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix typo for forwarding the DAC signing arguments #46959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix definition of PgoTerm and properties based on Versions #46964
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2646152 #46803
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Create trust boundary doc Fixes #45340 #45666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add project capabilities for publish properties #46221
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.15
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
